tool_description: Gives you live scores and odds for NBA, NFL, NCAAF, NCAAB, and NHL
name: Live Scores, Live Odds
title: Live Scores, Live Odds

api_list.name: NHL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-scores-live-odds.p.rapidapi.com/SportsAPI/nhl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-scores-live-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
